title: PAX AU 2015 - Riot not attending
body: With Riot announcing they wont be attending PAX 2015 AU , id like to know how many people in the community are upset by there choice to not attend.

replies.body:
We have been to PAX Australia the last two years and we know there was an expectation that we would be there this year. Instead we are focusing on the OPL Final, which is our first standalone RIOT event in OCE.

If you already purchased a ticket to PAX prior to the 4th May 2015 we would like to offer you the skin you would have received by attending our booth at the show. Simply send us your proof of purchase and summoner name and we will validate the ticket with PAX and then gift you your skin directly. We will process skins once we have full ticket validation from PAX.

Please send all proof of purchase and summoner names to pax2015@riotgames.com

It wasnt about the skin and free stuff, it was about the environment. Having the Riot staff there, watching the games, watching the limitless cosplay. Either way its disappointing that there wont at least be a booth. I am very disappointed that riot would not at least have something rather then nothing...

And i dont like how they decided to announce it to people on a tiny little thread that led to the lunapark venue.
What if I bought my ticket after 4th of may? Do I not get a skin?
Holy crap I'm late on the news on this one.
After last year It's pretty obvious why.
I am not going to pax but im still upset
